snippet.title: Isles of Sea and Sky - Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
We are happy to announce the reveal of our animated trailer!
Wishlist and play the demo on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233070/Akurra/

Sign up for the mailing list for monthly progress updates on development: https://mailchi.mp/ce0b29419a35/akurra-mailing-list

Twitter: https://twitter.com/CicadaGames

Animation Credits:
Takeshita Miki - Director, Animator - https://twitter.com/0126Takeshi
Minagawa Kazunori - Production Manager - https://twitter.com/tunasoba
Yosuke Ito - Producer
VIGORE - Production

Trailer Credits:
Jason Newman - Editing, Sound
Craig Collver - Music
Dan Collver - Gameplay Footage
